attributes.additional_details: Sunday trading is completely uncessary, in recent years due to online businesses surge together with lot of workload can be done remotely.  Using students to fill in weekend work not the wise option as they need more time in their education. As we Brexit by end of 2020, there will be less casual workers and the Sunday workforce will be needed to fill the gaps. Complete Sunday closure will give more valuable time with the families.
attributes.background: Stop Sunday trading give more time to families. Its time to stop sunday trading believe its no longer needed, as the online businesses are slowing the retail sectors and others.
